assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Steel Strips Wheels Limited designs, manufactures, and sells automotive steel wheel rims and alloy wheel rims in India and internationally. It offers wheels for two and three wheelers, passenger cars, multi utility vehicles, tractors, off road vehicles, and light and heavy commercial vehicles, as well as provides alloy wheels rims for passenger cars, and MUV's and caravan vehicles. Steel Strips Wheels Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Chandigarh, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Manohar Lal Jain FCS, FCA
companyOfficers.title: Exec. Director
